fields.label: Does your business use alternative identity proofing processes when a customer does not possess, and is unable to obtain, the necessary information or evidence of identity?
fields.detail-label: Describe the alternative identity proofing processes and the risk-based systems and controls used to establish customer identity.

fields.label: Does your business use alternative identity proofing processes when a customer possesses, but is unable to provide, information or evidence of identity due to COVID-19 Pandemic measures?
fields.detail-label: Describe the alternative identity proofing processes and the risk-based systems and controls used during the COVID-19 Pandemic.

fields.label: Does your business accept self-attestations from customers certifying that their identity information is true and correct if other identification processes are unavailable?
Does your business apply appropriate levels of ongoing customer due diligence to identify, mitigate, and manage ML/TF risks associated with identities established via self-attestation?
fields.detail-label: Describe the ongoing customer due diligence (OCDD) procedures applied to identities established via self-attestation.

fields.label: Does your business have controls to ensure you do not rely on a self-attestation if it is known or suspected to be incorrect or misleading?
fields.detail-label: Describe the controls in place to ensure self-attestations known or suspected to be incorrect or misleading are not relied upon.

fields.label: Does your business rely on copies of documents for verification (in lieu of originals or certified copies) when COVID-19 Pandemic measures prevent standard verification?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls for relying on copies of documents for verification during the COVID-19 Pandemic.

groups.title: Part 4.15: Alternative Identity Procedure
groups.description: Procedures to follow where a customer cannot provide satisfactory evidence of identity due to limited access to documents or COVID-19 Pandemic measures.

groups.title: Self-Attestation Controls
groups.description: Additional requirements and risk management for customers identified via self-attestation.
